outputs.output_descr: CPP Namibia: Enhancing Institutional and Human Resource Capacity through Local Level Coordination of Integrated Rangeland Management and Support (CPP NAM CALLC). CALLC will contribute to the goal by creating an enabling environment (knowledge, skills, capacity, and policies) for the adoption of sustainable land management and practices in the Ohangwena, Omusati, Oshana and Oshikoko Regions.

project_descr: Country Pilot Partnership Programme Namibia:  Enhancing Institutional and Human Resource Capacity through Local Level Coordination of Integrated Rangeland Management and Support: CPP NAM: CALLC Sub-Project
